name: Gravy Loyalty
tag_list: stamp-card-app, punch-card-app, mobile-loyalty-program, loyalty-program-for-small-business, loyalty-program-apps, loyalty-cards-for-business, digital-loyalty-card, loyalty-program-software, smartphone-app-for-business-loyalty, loyalty-card-programs, custo
overview:
Gravy Loyalty is a consumer loyalty platform for small businesses that uses web 2.0 and mobile app technologies.

Gravy allows any business to setup a simple, yet intelligent loyalty program in minutes using QR codes and mobile apps, replacing the traditional stamp cards used by many smalls businesses across the globe.

Gravy is different to some of the new systems that use geocoding as it’s the only system around that actually attempts to measure average spend and create an authentic tiered loyalty system without using any special hardware in the process.
